p: A total of 533 clinically suspected cases were recorded in Phuntsholing during the outbreak in 2016, and in 2017, 82 and 81 clinically suspected cases were recorded in Samtse and Samdrup Jongkhar respectively ( S1 Table). Age of these cases ranged from <1 to 88 years. In all three outbreaks, young adults of 25â€“34 years were mostly affected ( Table 1). The median age of the cases was 26 and 29 years for 2016 and 2017 respectively. The cases were higher among males compared to females (ratio of 1.2:1).
